name: Smuel Jam 2021 Game
description:
We held a lil'  7 hour game jam with my friend @Sapazu. He chose a pretty OK:ish palette for me so now I feel a bit bad for choosing an awful palette for him. We also used Unity 5.6 for "nostalgia" reasons.

Anyway, you control the ship with the arrow keys or the wasd. Holding space activates the ship's beam. Getting hit by bullets or going too far down the screen will restart the game.

This game isn't anything too fancy, just something fun we decided to do. :D
